page.title: 13Shopping
page.content: In our block,the town of Chesham is the main shopping area.Most of the shops are in or adjacent to the High Street.Many people go shopping once a week in Waitrose,which is a supermarket selling food.In Chesham there are 3 jewellers,4 chemists,4 shoe shops,4 banks,4 building societies,4 pubs,8 clothes shops and only 2 cafes but lots of fish and chip shops.In Chesham there is a building called Darsham Walk and it contains 8 small shops.Apart from the shops in town,there may be farm shops and general stores.The farm shop usually sells cheese,eggs and milk.Most milk is delivered along with eggs,bread and fruit juice,by the milk man.General stores sell almost anything a price higher than supermarkets.
